hints.label: thm-holography-complete
hints.title: Complete Proof of Holographic Principle (Summary)
hints.content:
2449: :label: thm-holography-complete
2450: 
2451: The Fragile Gas framework rigorously proves:
2452: 
2453: 1. **Informational Area Law** ({prf:ref}`thm-area-law-holography`):
2454:    $$
2455:    S_{\text{IG}}(A) = \frac{\text{Area}_{\text{CST}}(\partial A)}{4G_N}
2456:    $$
2457: 
2458: 2. **First Law of Entanglement** ({prf:ref}`thm-first-law-holography`):
2459:    $$
2460:    \delta S_{\text{IG}} = \beta \cdot \delta E_{\text{swarm}}
2461:    $$
2462: 
2463: 3. **Einstein's Equations** ({prf:ref}`thm-einstein-equations-holography`):
2464:    $$
2465:    G_{\mu\nu} + \Lambda_{\text{eff}} g_{\mu\nu} = 8\pi G_N T_{\mu\nu}
2466:    $$
2467: 
2468: 4. **AdS Geometry** ({prf:ref}`thm-ads-geometry`):
2469:    $$
2470:    \Lambda_{\text{eff}} < 0 \quad \text{(UV regime)}
2471:    $$
2472: 
2473: 5. **AdS/CFT Correspondence** ({prf:ref}`thm-ads-cft-correspondence`):
2474:    $$
2475:    Z_{\text{gravity}}[\text{CST}] = Z_{\text{CFT}}[\text{IG}]
2476:    $$
hints.raw_directive:
2446: ### 6.1. Main Results Proven
2447: 
2448: :::{prf:theorem} Complete Proof of Holographic Principle (Summary)
2449: :label: thm-holography-complete
2450: 
2451: The Fragile Gas framework rigorously proves:
2452: 
2453: 1. **Informational Area Law** ({prf:ref}`thm-area-law-holography`):
2454:    $$
2455:    S_{\text{IG}}(A) = \frac{\text{Area}_{\text{CST}}(\partial A)}{4G_N}
2456:    $$
2457: 
2458: 2. **First Law of Entanglement** ({prf:ref}`thm-first-law-holography`):
2459:    $$
2460:    \delta S_{\text{IG}} = \beta \cdot \delta E_{\text{swarm}}
2461:    $$
2462: 
2463: 3. **Einstein's Equations** ({prf:ref}`thm-einstein-equations-holography`):
2464:    $$
2465:    G_{\mu\nu} + \Lambda_{\text{eff}} g_{\mu\nu} = 8\pi G_N T_{\mu\nu}
2466:    $$
2467: 
2468: 4. **AdS Geometry** ({prf:ref}`thm-ads-geometry`):
2469:    $$
2470:    \Lambda_{\text{eff}} < 0 \quad \text{(UV regime)}
2471:    $$
2472: 
2473: 5. **AdS/CFT Correspondence** ({prf:ref}`thm-ads-cft-correspondence`):
2474:    $$
2475:    Z_{\text{gravity}}[\text{CST}] = Z_{\text{CFT}}[\text{IG}]
2476:    $$
2477:

hints.label: pred-computational-holography
hints.title: Computational Verification of Holography
hints.content:
2498: :label: pred-computational-holography
2499: 
2500: Implementing the Fragile Gas algorithm with parameters tuned to the marginal-stability AdS regime should exhibit:
2501: 
2502: 1. **Area law**: Measured $S_{\text{IG}}(A)$ vs. measured $|\gamma_A|$ should be linear with slope $1/(4G_N)$
2503: 
2504: 2. **Conformal invariance**: 2-point correlation functions $G_{\text{IG}}^{(2)}(x, y)$ should satisfy:
2505:    $$
2506:    G^{(2)}(\lambda x, \lambda y) = \lambda^{-2\Delta} G^{(2)}(x, y)
2507:    $$
2508: 
2509: 3. **Negative curvature**: CST should exhibit hyperbolic geometry (negative scalar curvature)
2510: 
2511: 4. **Wilson loops**: Area law scaling $\langle W[\gamma] \rangle \sim e^{-\sigma \text{Area}(\gamma)}$ with string tension $\sigma > 0$
hints.raw_directive:
2495: ### 6.3. Falsifiable Predictions
2496: 
2497: :::{prf:prediction} Computational Verification of Holography
2498: :label: pred-computational-holography
2499: 
2500: Implementing the Fragile Gas algorithm with parameters tuned to the marginal-stability AdS regime should exhibit:
2501: 
2502: 1. **Area law**: Measured $S_{\text{IG}}(A)$ vs. measured $|\gamma_A|$ should be linear with slope $1/(4G_N)$
2503: 
2504: 2. **Conformal invariance**: 2-point correlation functions $G_{\text{IG}}^{(2)}(x, y)$ should satisfy:
2505:    $$
2506:    G^{(2)}(\lambda x, \lambda y) = \lambda^{-2\Delta} G^{(2)}(x, y)
2507:    $$
2508: 
2509: 3. **Negative curvature**: CST should exhibit hyperbolic geometry (negative scalar curvature)
2510: 
2511: 4. **Wilson loops**: Area law scaling $\langle W[\gamma] \rangle \sim e^{-\sigma \text{Area}(\gamma)}$ with string tension $\sigma > 0$
2512:
